  "reasoning_steps": [
    "Step 1: Completed Balance Sheet by linking Cash to Cash Flow ending cash; projecting A/R, Inventory, and A/P using DSO/DIO/DPO drivers (A/R = Revenue/365*DSO; Inventory = COGS/365*DIO; A/P = COGS/365*DPO); rolling PP&E forward (Beg PP&E + CapEx - Depreciation) using CapEx % of revenue and Depreciation % of beginning PP&E; keeping other non-driver lines flat per existing template; rolling Retained Earnings forward (Beg RE + Net Income - Dividends/Buybacks) and keeping Common Stock/APIC flat.",
    "Step 2: Tied Cash Flow by linking Net Income from Income Statement; calculating D&A from beginning PP&E * depreciation %; calculating working capital changes from Balance Sheet period-over-period deltas with correct signs; setting CapEx as negative (cash outflow) based on revenue * capex %; linking Dividends/Buybacks to the Balance Sheet estimate line (as a cash outflow); calculating Debt & Other Financing as the net change in short-term + long-term debt from the Balance Sheet.",
    "Step 3: Validated the model by ensuring Cash Flow ending cash rolls forward from beginning cash plus CFO/CFI/CFF and that Balance Sheet cash references Cash Flow ending cash; confirmed Balance Sheet totals use existing total formulas and that working capital and PP&E rollforwards feed the Cash Flow change lines consistently."

}

reasoning_steps: Step 1: Completed Balance Sheet by linking Cash to Cash Flow ending cash; projecting A/R, Inventory, and A/P using DSO/DIO/DPO drivers (A/R = Revenue/365*DSO; Inventory = COGS/365*DIO; A/P = COGS/365*DPO); rolling PP&E forward (Beg PP&E + CapEx - Depreciation) using CapEx % of revenue and Depreciation % of beginning PP&E; keeping other non-driver lines flat per existing template; rolling Retained Earnings forward (Beg RE + Net Income - Dividends/Buybacks) and keeping Common Stock/APIC flat.

Step 2: Tied Cash Flow by linking Net Income from Income Statement; calculating D&A from beginning PP&E * depreciation %; calculating working capital changes from Balance Sheet period-over-period deltas with correct signs; setting CapEx as negative (cash outflow) based on revenue * capex %; linking Dividends/Buybacks to the Balance Sheet estimate line (as a cash outflow); calculating Debt & Other Financing as the net change in short-term + long-term debt from the Balance Sheet.

Step 3: Validated the model by ensuring Cash Flow ending cash rolls forward from beginning cash plus CFO/CFI/CFF and that Balance Sheet cash references Cash Flow ending cash; confirmed Balance Sheet totals use existing total formulas and that working capital and PP&E rollforwards feed the Cash Flow change lines consistently.
